LFADS.RunCollection¶

classLFADS.RunCollection(rootPath, name, datasetCollection[, runParams, runSpecs])[source]¶

Bases: handle, matlab.mixin.Copyable, matlab.mixin.CustomDisplay

A set of LFADS.Run instances utilizing different subsets of LFADS.Dataset insstances in a LFADS.DatasetCollection. A RunCollection is a logical grouping of LFADS runs, where multiple runs specifications are each run with multiple parameter settings. The run specifications are provided as arrays of RunSpec instances which indicate the name and which datasets are included for each run specification. The parameter sweeps are specified using arrays of RunParams instances. From these, a nRunSpecs x nParams matrix of LFADS.Run instances will be generated. These in turn can be used to train individual LFADS models on a particular set of datasets (or single dataset) and particular parameter settings.

Properties

rootPath (char) = ''[source]¶

Root path on disk under which individual Runs will be stored

name (char) = ''[source]¶

Name of this RunCollection, determines its relative path on disk

comment (char) = ''[source]¶

Textual comment for convenience

version (uint32) = 3[source]¶

version used for backwards compatibility

datasetCollection = None[source]¶

DatasetCollection instance

Read-only Properties

Read-onlyruns = None[source]¶

nRunSpecs x nParams matrix of LFADS.Run instances

Read-onlyparams = None[source]¶

array of RunParams instances

Read-onlyrunSpecs = None[source]¶

array of LFADS.RunSpec instances used to specify the runs for each param setting

Dependent Properties

DependentnParams = None[source]¶

number of parameter settings in params

DependentnRunSpecs = None[source]¶

number of run specifications

DependentnRunsTotal = None[source]¶

number of runs total (equal to nParams * nRunsEachParam

Dependentpath = None[source]¶

unique folder given by rootPath/name

DependentfileShellScriptTensorboard = None[source]¶

path the location where a shell script to launch TensorBoard for all runs will be written

DependentfileSummaryText = None[source]¶

path where summary text info will be written

DependentnDatasets = None[source]¶

number of datasets within the datasetCollection

Methods

[rc] = RunCollection(rootPath, name, datasetCollection[, runParams, runSpecs])[source]¶
Parameters:
  • rootPath – string location on disk under which run collections will be saved
  • name – string unique identifier for this RunCollection, also used as subfolder within rootPath
  • datasetCollection – LFADS.DatasetCollection DatasetCollection to be used by runs within this RunCollection
  • runParams – array of LFADS.RunParams instances Parameter settings which will be used uniformly by all runs, will also be serialized in the folder path
  • runSpecs – array of LFADS.RunSpec instances RunSpec instances describing the names and lists of datasets for each run that will be run with each set of params
addRunSpec()[source]¶

Adds new RunSpec instance(s) to this RunCollection. Automatically appends new runs to .runs.

Parameters:runSpec – LFADS.RunSpec new RunSpec instances describing the names and datasets included. Each of these new RunSpecs will be run on each of the parameter settings in .params
clearRunSpecs()[source]¶

Flush list of run specs

filterRunSpecs()[source]¶

Apply selection mask to list of runs specs

Parameters:mask – logical or indices selection mask applied to .runSpecs
addParams()[source]¶

Adds new LFADS.RunParams instance(s) to this RunCollection. Automatically appends new runs to .runs.

Parameters:params – LFADS.RunParams array of parameter settings to run each RunSpec on
clearParams()[source]¶

Flush list of run params

filterParams()[source]¶

Apply selection mask to .params

Parameters:mask – logical or indices selection mask applied to .runs
clearAll()[source]¶
generateRuns()[source]¶

Methods

[tf, idx] = ismemberRunSpecs()[source]¶

Determine if any run specs that match runSpecSearch are found in .runSpecs. If runSpecSearch is string or cellstr, matches by name. If runSpecSearch is an array of RunSpec instances, finds them using isequal. If runSpecSearch is a vector of indices, selects from runSpecs directly

Parameters:runSpecSearch – array of LFADS.RunSpec, strings, or indices into .runSpecs
Returns:
logical
does each runSpec exist within .runSpecs
idx
: indices
which index in .runSpecs
Return type:tf
[runSpecs, idx] = findRunSpecs()[source]¶

Find run specs that match runSpecSearch. Throws an error if any run is not found. If runSpecSearch is string or cellstr, matches by name. If runSpecSearch is an array of RunSpec instances, finds them using isequal. If runSpecSearch is a vector of indices, selects from runSpecs directly.

Parameters:runSpecSearch – array of LFADS.RunSpec, strings, or indices into .runSpecs
Returns:
LFADS.Run
matching runs
idx
: vector of indices
vector of indices into .runSpecs of matching run instances
Return type:runs
[tf, idx] = ismemberParams()[source]¶

Determine if any run params that match paramSearch are found in .params. If paramSearch is an array of RunParams instances, finds them using isequal. If paramSearch is a vector of indices, selects from runParams directly.

Parameters:paramSearch – array of LFADS.RunParams or indices into .params
Returns:
LFADS.RunParams
matching params
idx
: vector of indices
selection into .params of matches
Return type:params
[params, idx] = findParams()[source]¶

Find run params that match paramSearch. Throws an error if any RunParams is not found. If paramSearch is an array of RunParams instances, finds them using isequal. If paramSearch is a vector of indices, selects from runParams directly

Parameters:paramSearch – array of LFADS.RunParams or indices into .params
Returns:
LFADS.RunParams
matching params

: vector of indices
selection into .params of matches

[runs, rowIdx, colIdx] = findRuns()[source]¶

Returns a subset of the .runs matrix for a certain subset of RunSpecs and RunParams. Throws an error if any run is not found.

Parameters:
  • runSpecSearch – array of LFADS.RunSpec, strings, or indices into .runSpecs
  • paramSearch – array of LFADS.RunParams, or indices into .params
Returns:

LFADS.Run matrix

matching runs as matrix

rowIdx
: vector of indices

vector of indices matching into .runSpecs

colIdx
: vector of indices

vector of indices matching into .params
Return type:

runs
[str] = getTensorboardCommand()[source]¶

string
Command which can luanch TensorBoard from command line
Return type:cmd
[f] = writeTensorboardShellScript()[source]¶

Generates the shell command text to launch a TensorBoard displaying all runs within this collection and saves it to a file inside the RunCollection’s path

Returns:
string
Path to the shell script, will match .fileShellScriptTensorboard
Return type:file
[f] = writeSummaryText()[source]¶

Generates a text file sumamrizing the details of the RunSpecs and RunParams within this run collection.

Returns:
string
Path to the text file, which will match .fileSummaryText
Return type:file
